name: Deepeth Woods - LD48
description:
Journey through the Deepeth Woods - but beware!

The deeper you go, the fiercer the mystical creatures of the forest will try to hinder your efforts.

At the end of the forest, the mighty King of Hares awaits you.

Best enjoyed in fullscreen. :)


Controlls:

WASD - move

Space - attack


Credits:

PandaDerZwote - game logic

colapolka - assets and animation

Made with Godot, Photoshop, cgMusic, SynthFont, Audacity, a cheap mic and our lovely voices
